CustomField.description: This field is used in show or Hide the Submit for Approval quick action button.
CustomField.formula: OR($RecordType.Name = 'AQMD - California Air Quality Management', $RecordType.Name = 'Collector Case', $RecordType.Name = 'Customer Master - Change ShipTo/Gen To Customer', $RecordType.Name = 'Customer Master - Reactivate Account', $RecordType.Name = 'Customer PO Case', $RecordType.Name = 'Inactivate Account', $RecordType.Name = 'Invoice Delivery', $RecordType.Name = 'New Customer Request', $RecordType.Name = 'Non Standard Billing Closed Order', $RecordType.Name = 'Non Standard Billing WIN', $RecordType.Name = 'Price Request TS', $RecordType.Name = 'TSE - Add Case')
CustomField.label: QuickAction RT Formula
